title: february 19: kellogg’s weird history
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about two brothers from Michigan creating a cereal empire, and some weird stuff that happened along the way. Afterwards, she remembers the birth of an iconic musician. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
